item.title: Glock Trigger Enhancements
item.description: The Glock 17 comes from the factory with about a 5 pound trigger pull. This isn’t bad, but it’s also not great depending on your intended use. I only use my G17 for target practice and maybe competition in the future so I don’t have to worry about any legality issues with gun modifications and self defense. A lighter and smoother trigger pull will hopefully help increase my accuracy by reducing the force needed to squeeze the trigger, increasing the likelihood of staying on target.
